kALI:

"I'm Kali" replied the femme by comm link in a secret frecuency"I'll 
turn off the blasters in that way that seems a fail of the systems, 
in order to let you work but if you're betray us Ender, You will 
regret have born... "


Like the femme said the lazers turned of in that way that seemed a 
failiture, in fact a red light started to blink and the alarm to rang.
Kali continue checking the room.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        He mutters under his breath and starts bouncing around the 
room to 
> avoid the shots.  He opens a com to Shivah.  "SHIVAH!  What in 
blazes do you 
> think you're doing?!?  Things are under control here!  Turn off the 
BLASTED 
> defenses before I blast THEM!  Ender out!"
